editorialNotes.standard: We love the sugar rush we get from tackling sweet challenges with tough cookies in this deliciously lighthearted action RPG.

We wouldn’t be surprised if Subway Surfers kept its spot near the top of the charts for decades to come. Its heart is the key to its stamina, revealed in loving details lavished on cities from Chicago to Shenzhen in its World Tours or in the lovable ruffians awarded in its frequent events. It’s a cinch to pick up, but we’re still finding new ways to master it years and miles later.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Everyone’s suspicious in Among Us!, a fascinating multiplayer game set aboard a damaged spaceship. Whether you’re a Crewmate making quick repairs or an Impostor taking out key systems (and unsuspecting players), each match is a riveting mystery. And a hilarious one, especially when smart accusations or sly misdirection sway who gets voted off the ship. It’s a test of wits anyone can enjoy.
editorialNotes.short: Customize your look with Halloween-themed hats.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: How far can you roll the ball?

editorialNotes.standard: Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercell’s awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package that’s easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, there’s no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

editorialNotes.standard: It took less than a minute for us to get hooked on this series all over again. The sequel to Rovio’s blockbuster puzzler polishes the feathery fun to a golden sheen—and with more than just beautiful new graphics. Features like multi-stage levels, pig-punishing spells and choosing the order in which you fling birds make the game more irresistible than ever. Whether it’s your first Angry Birds game or your 10th, you’ll be flying high in no time.
Streamlined squad play, smooth touch controls, and thrilling extractions bring this classic action franchise into the modern age.

editorialNotes.tagline: What goes up, must come down

editorialNotes.standard: The ocean’s your preyground and you’ve gotta keep feeding in this deliciously goofy arcade romp. Rushing from meal to meal—fishes, birds, hapless beachgoers—keeps the pace exhilarating, and the gorgeous environments are a feast for your eyes. Meanwhile, random hazards (mines, pollution, bigger sharks) add a thrilling sense of danger—reminding you that you’re not the only predator in these waters.

ios.subtitle: Fly High & Cook Food in Sky
Cut a watermelon in one slice!

editorialNotes.short: Slice and dice in exciting arcade challenges.

editorialNotes.standard: We’re blown away by the newest installment of EA’s popular racing franchise. We found ourselves gawking at reflections, lens flare, and scenery as we motored through hairpin turns at breakneck speeds. The improvements aren't just cosmetic, though—you'll find yourself stunned by the believable roars of engines and the huge variety of true-to-life cars and courses. RR3 also packs great new gameplay features like Time Shifted Multiplayer, which allows us to race asynchronously against friends in fierce tests of driving prowess.

editorialNotes.tagline: Can you build the best base?
editorialNotes.standard: It's hard to understate Clash of Clans’ massive influence in establishing complex strategic multiplayer on mobile. Over time the build, train, and attack gameplay has been honed to perfection through fantastic updates. We still love logging on to find that our meticulously placed and upgraded fortifications survived another onslaught, and to experience the rush of victory after our carefully assembled attack force yet again smashed through enemy defenses.
With exciting events, famous characters, and wild courses, Nintendo's legendary kart-racing series burns rubber on mobile.
editorialNotes.short: Tour the world and race on tracks in cities around the globe.

editorialNotes.standard: Turns out that fighting Diablo Immortal’s monstrous hordes is a heavenly experience. The flashy, frenetic combat never fails to satisfy with touch controls and controllers, and discovering powerful gear can completely change play styles in amazing ways. Friends can help defeat demons in dungeons or, later, take the fight to other players in online battlegrounds. Whether we play for 10 minutes or an evening, the sheer variety of dungeons and challenges ensures we have a fiendishly good time in our pursuit of ultimate power.
With new mini-games and real-time multiplayer duels, this fruit-slashing sequel is a cut above.

ios.subtitle: Knock em all from the arena!

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Beat your boss & kick the jerk
Control Mario with just a tap!

editorialNotes.standard: He's here! We're all about pulling off stylish moves with a single tap, thanks to super-simple, one-touch controls. But collecting all the pink coins? That takes skill. With tons of unlocks (including Luigi!), you’ll be playing this one long after you reach the final flagpole.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Run, jump and win the fun race
Shoot and take over the bases!

name: Tomb of the Mask: Pixel Maze

editorialNotes.standard: Speed is survival in this devilishly fast tomb-raiding arcade game. Like some glorious mix of Indiana Jones and Pac-Man, you race from room to room, nabbing all the coins you can while staying ahead of an ever-moving (and lethal) wall. With its crafty mazes, tricky traps, simple controls, and eye-popping retro minimalism, it’s an experience you’ll happily lose yourself in.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: A fast and frantic battle royale
editorialNotes.standard: Survive the fierce battle for victory.
editorialNotes.short: Survive the fierce battle for victory.

ios.subtitle: Find or be found. Up to you!

editorialNotes.standard: Rec Room is a sprawling, vibrant universe of wildly different multiplayer experiences, which makes it easy to find whatever we’re in the mood for. We can play paintball, slay monsters in dungeons, or simply hang out with friends on a moonlit island beach—and so much more. But it’s not all about playing: Rec Room lets us make things too. With intuitive tools for creating and sharing our own experiences, Rec Room provides a fantastic way to turn imagination into digital reality.
Squad up! Build a team of lumberjacks, barbarians, and other famous faces from developer Supercell’s hits in this marvelously manic multiplayer romp.

Daredevil. Storm. Juggernaut. Vision. Kabam’s beautiful brawler gives you control of dozens of beloved heroes and villains as you punch, kick, and blast your way across the Marvel universe. A simple and intuitive set of attacks, counters, and special attacks make for edge-of-your-seat combat, but you’ll spend just as much time finding and upgrading your super-team. Figuring out the best way to use them is key to surviving bouts with relentless opponents—and progressing through treacherous story quests.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Change the Shape & Win a Race
Grow the biggest in the game!

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

name: Monster Draft: Running Game
artistName: OREON STUDIOS OYUN YAZILIM TEKNOLOJI TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI

editorialNotes.tagline: Don't worry about winning, just don't die
editorialNotes.standard: Death’s never been funnier. Funny enough that when we die while poking a bear or wiring house lights, we’re as happy as when we live. Win or lose, these clever, cartoonish mini-games make survival an irresistible challenge.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Choose a Pokémon and team up!

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Reach the bottom of the tower!

editorialNotes.standard: It's back! Sprint for the leaderboards in the sequel to one of the App Store's most popular endless runners, which arrives with a host of fabulous improvements, from overhauled graphics to refined controls, original minecart and zip-line challenges, and much more.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Outfit7’s beloved Talking Tom series has another winner. Everything in this endless runner pops—its adorably detailed visuals, its cool-as-ice tunes, the constant surprises in the action-packed environments. Getting to play as Tom’s fuzzy friends just cranks up the fun even higher.
